text: Albert Stanley Gordon McDonald (12 March 1890 – 14 June 1952) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Bert McDonald's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1890 births Category:1952 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Bert McDonald
